TopicTitle: KSP installed without launcher, .exe, or patcher?

Articles.Content:
I deleted KSP 1.0 and downloaded 1.0.4 because my launcher doesn't like updating for whatever reason, but now all I have is the game files, like I said, without the launcher, the KSP.exe or patcher. Is it in the file? I didn't see anything in the launcher data file, but all that should be in the KSP\_win file anyways, in full view...

So any ideas?

Find KSP.exe and double-click it. It should be in the main KSP\_win folder.

If it's not there, it should be. Re-download?
I didn't see it, but there was no patcher or launcher. Sorry if I didn't make that clear, I thought I had.

Wondering the same. Just downloaded 1.0.4 and there isn't a ksp.exe anywhere that I can see.

Since it's been a while since you posted, did you manage to get it running?

KSP.exe IS the game, so not having it is a bit of a problem.

Launcher and patcher are ... useless. Their absence is not an issue, although launcher.exe is in the ksp-win-1-0-4.zip along with KSP.exe

Soooo - there are several versions of 1.0.4 you *could* have downloaded, depending on OS, etc. Care to specify which you have?

Hi, not the original poster, but similar issue. I deleted what I had (Win 1.0.4) and tried a fresh download. Don't know why, but the exe file wasn't there, again, so I rinsed and repeated. I guess third times the charm, eh? 

Still having problems though, because KSP will start, but then freezes on the load screen. For the sake of experimentation, I deleted the part file that it was hung up on (one of the Squad engines, but I don't recall now), and tried loading again. Loaded past that point, then froze on some other random part file. I figure the download was corrupted or something, so I'm currently installing again. 

Crossing my fingers.
